primary.description: Main brand color used for primary buttons, active navigation, key UI elements, and brand identity

secondary.description: Supporting brand color for secondary buttons, less prominent actions, and complementary UI elements

accent.description: Highlight color for drawing attention to specific elements like badges, tags, notifications, and call-to-action items

surface.description: Component surfaces like cards, modals, dropdowns, and panels

text.description: Typography colors for headings, body text, labels, and placeholders

border.description: Borders for inputs, cards, dividers, and separators

status.description: Semantic colors for alerts, toasts, form validation, and status indicators

interaction.description: State colors for interactive elements like buttons, links, and form controls

link.description: Anchor and navigation link colors across different states

shadow.description: Box shadow colors for depth and elevation effects

overlay.description: Semi-transparent backgrounds for modals, drawers, and backdrop layers
